title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - What does the rejected take off (RTO)?
description:
In this how to we are going to look how we can use the rejected take off functionality of two large airliners: Boeing 787 and an Airbus A320. We will start with looking at how to configure this functionality in the airplane and will continue with a demo. After this we will switch to the A320 which is the A32NX version and will repeat the same.

If you also want to use the A32NX addon based on this video, you can download it from the site below:
https://github.com/flybywiresim/a32nx

What does RTO do during take off
Using auto brake MAX in an Airbus A320
